org.doctag.domain

Class Invoice

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.doctag.domain.Document
      • org.doctag.domain.Invoice

  • public class Invoice
extends Document
    Representation of a docTag document with type invoice.
    Author:
    Jochen Schalanda
    See Also:
    "docTag specification 0.5, section 2.1"
